Ground Your Prompts Automatically

With Record Snapshots, it’s easier than ever to use your Salesforce data in Prompt Builder. Record Snapshots brings a new way to ground your prompts, by automatically including data available on the user’s page layout for an object with one resource.

Where: This change applies to Lightning Experience in Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited editions. Einstein generative AI is available in Lightning Experience.

When: Record Snapshots is available on a rolling basis starting in sandbox environments on June 5, 2024 and in production on June 12, 2024.

How: From the resource picker in Prompt Builder, select an input object of the prompt template, and then select ✨Record Snapshot. Then, craft a prompt as you normally do, and Record Snapshot grounds the prompt with data available on the user's page layout for the object.
title: Ground Your Prompts Automatically
